FuncDef: The reset e-trunk packet-statistics command clears statistics of E-Trunk packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the ID of an E-Trunk.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 128.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before collecting statistics of E-Trunk packets during a certain period, run the reset e-trunk packet-statistics command to clear statistics. Then, you can run the display e-trunk command to view statistics.
